data.title: Burned for $67
data.text: I had used this company one other time.  It was a great experience...BUT...I purchased a Living Social voucher for them in August 2014.  I tried numerous times to book an appointment but was continually told that they lost their dock and to be patient.  They assured me that my voucher would not expire.  Well, today I tried again to book.  It seems they are no longer in business.  I called Living Social to try to get a credit in Living Social bucks but they informed me that they can no longer give me a credit as they don't use this company anymore.   They also said that my purchase value with Pirates Life Boat rental never expires.  WHAT GOOD DOES THAT DO ME FOR A COMPANY THAT HAS BLOWN DOORS??!!  I won't be using Living Social again.  Apparently they don't check out the companies they do business with.

data.title: Customer service does not exist with these guys
data.text: Called many many times and left messages on the company VM...NO call backs.  Do not waste your time.  To many other better companies out there that actually want your business

data.title: Duffy boat rental
data.text: Have used them several times for electric boat rentals.  We have been patient and made reservations, but all works out well.  Have used Groupon / Living Social with them and although there are limitations, I have never had any trouble with them honoring them.  Great way to spend 90 min, bring your own snacks and drinks and enjoy the view!

data.title: Fun evening on the harbor!
data.text: We had a group of 10 and enjoyed a fantastic evening out on the harbor.  The staff, from reservations to the guys who put us on the boat were wonderful...friendly and helpful.  The area that they were out of is under construction, so a bit hard to find, but other than that, easy, peasy!  Boats were clean and in good condition.

data.title: Duffy Boat Rentals
data.text: Good place to rent Duffy Boats.  Tried this place a couple times from a GroupOn deal.  Sometimes they are hard to get a hold of to make reservations, but besides that, nice boats, friendly staff and I recommend!

data.title: Top notch service, now my go to Duffy boat peeps
data.text:
These people MAKE THIS PLACE. sooooo fun and helpful, quick, knowledgeable. We so enjoyed all the employees. From the office to the boat peeps. We felt they actually cared about us and made it fun...which HELLO OTHER DUFFY COMPANIES IN NEWPORT.....LEARN!!!! We go to do the dufus because it's supposed to be a fun experience paid with our money. And these people here GET IT. so, for now on....it's pirates life!!!! Love, love, love. 
Coats were in very good condition. Slow but very clean.

data.title: Wow! Super fun experience!
data.text: Check for discounts, but at almost any normal or reduced price, this is worth the time and money.  The dock staff is personable, the boats are clean and easy to pilot around the harbor.  You need a cole of hours to cruise the whole harbor, but there is a lot to see and enjoy.  These folks make that a whole lot of fun!

data.title: Pirates LIfe Boat Rental is where it's at
data.text:
OK, you see them poking around the harbor in Newport Beach, and wonder, gosh is it worth it? YES! Pirates life was the name of the place we rented from and they are fantastic. The boat was clean, they had an onboard map so you wouldn't get lost, and a nice stereo system. The electric Duffy boat was very quiet, you hardly knew it was on, and was in good shape. Wrap around glass at the front so it didn't get too cold. And the views, wow. Cruising the harbor was so much fun, whether you are local or visiting, it's a must do. 

So, here's what you do, pack some wine and cheese and hit the water. A couple of hours is the perfect time and you will really enjoy it.
